newsitem.title: UK: NWE straight-run fuel-low sulphur falls with crude.
newsitem.headline: NWE straight-run fuel-low sulphur falls with crude.

text.p: Straight-run fuel oil took something of a back seat on Friday as the market focussed on the end of the French Elf refinery strike and the spectre of extra American cracked barrels.
Dealers said low sulphur straight-run was down in line with crude's losses, but that the weaker numbers failed to entice buyers.
The slow but steady buying of Russian straight-run has thinned supplies and prices eased narrowly. Traders said there was no fresh news of any export tariff.
